segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing—water's pouring out everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle but doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, grabbing cookies, and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, right behind the mom who has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, with bushes and a path—such a contrast to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're risking all that for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
